Question
========

The mean of X is 5 and the standard deviation of X is 1. A new variable Z is created using the formula Z = (X - 5)/1. The mean of Z is

Answerlist
----------

* -5
* 0
* 1

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* -5: Incorrect
* 0: Correct
* 1: Incorrect
